archimate:Goal.name: Conduct a security assessment and provide a report with mitigation recommendations for HIaaS and OCP by the end of 2022
archimate:Goal.documentation: HiaaS and OCP, while for sales purposes grouped in Sovereign Hybrid Cloud, remain two separate services and platforms, and hence will be assessed separately. This is why we refer to them separately also here, instead of using the name Sovereign Hybrid Cloud.
